SELECT te.exam_id, te.title, te.start_time, te.end_time, te.create_time, ts.nick_name as create_name, te.status FROM tb_exam te LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user ts ON te.create_by = ts.user_id
AND te.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND te.start_time >= CONCAT(#{startTime},' 00:00:00')
AND te.end_time <= CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59.999')
ORDER BY te.create_time DESC
